title: Cancer (Oncology)
desc: A lot of cancers are now curable, especially if detected at an early stage. Long-term remission is also possible in cancer detected at later stages.

title: Cardiology
desc: Cardiology is a specialty that deals with disorders of the heart including coronary artery disease, valvular heart disease, heart failure.

title: Ear, Nose & Throat (ENT)
desc: ENT doctors specialise in the diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the ears, nose (including sinus) and throat (including voice and speech) .
